body:
It would be nice to have an option in the preferences to sort player's hand:
- by card type (creatures, lands, spells...)
- by manacost
- by card type, then manacost
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: Option for sorting player's hand is needed
content:
_From [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/) on August 23, 2013 15:40:26_

It would be nice to have an option in the preferences to sort player's hand:
- by card type (creatures, lands, spells...)
- by manacost
- by card type, then manacost

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=395_
